title: Project Documentation
content:
Project Documentation # Here you will find a series of preparatory protocols I rely on to structure the work.
Research Protocol # Outlines the overall project’s vision. It contextualizes the project in relation to specific objectives and outlines a broad-level work plan.
Ethics Protocol # Specifies ethical considerations, including risks of harm and mitigation strategies.
Interview Protocol # An overview of the questions I will be asking research participants.
Coding Protocol # Outlines the analytical objectives and coding strategy implemented to achieve them.

title: Team
content: About # Zack’s bio and information about the CITF as institutional host.

title: Hello world
content: Welcome to the website for my CITF Postdoc! This will serve as a hub for documenting and sharing my work. I decided to do this as a way of managing and sharing always-updated drafts of research protocols with my supervisor and team members, but it is also generally useful for keeping my thoughts organized. I will also use this blog section to write my thoughts as the project progresses.
